Original:
思考了很久還是決定Po出來當日的體驗
但也只是希望酒吧能更好
先說優點
是新的酒吧 氣氛感覺不錯 空間也是蠻大的
除了一樓些許座位及吧台還有地下室不少大的位置
調酒部分  創調的部分表現都還不錯  看得出有用心的呈現出特色  客製特調的部分也是都算好喝水準之上

缺點的部分
當天有點炸物拼盤   味道還可以 但那個量真的非常少 380的拼盤大概就10x20公分的長碟子裝    然後點了一份水餃大概等了30分鐘  明明店裡其實沒什麼人
酒的部分 可能我們也沒有表達清楚喜好  其實有幾杯特調的味道不是很合某些人的胃口  風味呈現的部分希望可以多做介紹

最後是服務的部分
由於被安排到樓下  因此除了一開始有服務生幫我們點餐點酒  以及中途若剛好有服務生經過我們才會剛好點酒  不然都得自己上樓去找人點餐或點酒  但中途也有服務生下來問我們是否想要喝個shot 我們也說好的 （我們以為是要幫我們點的） 當他問我們要純的還是調過的時候我們跟她說純的  那她也說那要離開的時候再請妳們喝調的  但很奇怪的是我們那盤純的shot  大概過了20分鐘都還沒出現  於事才又再次跟服務員提醒了一次後才終於端上來 最後離開時我們8-9位連同10%的服務費一共消費了快9000元 而且只能付現或轉帳… 最後也是沒有喝到所謂調的shot

我想說的是  這樣的服務  然後還收10%的服務費 上上下下跑了很多趟點酒  明明沒什麼客人  卻也沒什麼被服務到… 雖然說店家請酒是美意  雖然主動說了  但就算不請也沒關係 不過當這林林總總的事件加起來的感覺就讓人非常不好時  這個就成為了另一個不愉快的點

然後支付方式也只能付現   不知道是還沒申請還是為了省那手續費  有點不人性  看這邊評價都是好的 也蠻多ig貼文推薦 抱著很期待的心情去  但卻是一次不太愉快的體驗
EN:
After thinking for a long time, I decided to decide the experience of the day of PO
But I just hope that the bar can be better
First talk about advantages
It's a new bar atmosphere. It feels good. The space is quite large
In addition to some seats on the first floor and bar, there are many large locations in the basement
The performance of the section of the bartending part is not bad. It can be seen that the part with the specialty and customary adjustment of the specialty is also considered to be a delicious level.

Disadvantage part
On the same day, the frying platter flavor is okay, but the platter with a very small amount of 380 is about 10x20 cm long dishes and then ordered a dumpling. After about 30 minutes, there is no one in the store.
The part of the wine may not be expressed clearly. In fact, there are a few cups of special flavors.

Finally, the service part
Because it was arranged downstairs, except for the original waiter to help us order meals, and if there is just a waiter, we will just order wine, otherwise you have to go upstairs to find someone to order or drink, but there is also a halfway. The waiter came down and asked if we wanted to drink a Shot. We also said it was good (we thought it was to help us order it). When he asked us if we were pure or tuned, we told her that she said purely When you leave, please ask you to drink, but it ’s strange that our pure SHOT is about 20 minutes before it happened before it happened. After the waiter, we reminded the waiter again and finally came up. -9 is consumed by a total of 9,000 yuan with a 10%service fee and can only be paid or transferred ... In the end, it is not the so -called adjustment Shot

What I want to say is that this kind of service and then collect 10%of the service fee and run up and down a lot of wine. Obviously there is no guest, but there is nothing to be served ... Although the store is asking for wine, although it takes the initiative to say it It doesn't matter, but when the general incident of this Linlin adds up, it makes people very bad. This becomes another unpleasant point.

Then the payment method can only be paid, I don’t know if I haven't applied for it or for the provincial handling fee, it is a bit uncontrollable. Looking at the evaluation here, there are a lot of IG posts. Too pleasant experience
